oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bureau Of Misinformation - Audition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM audition program for Bureau Of Misinformation, featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Lazy Jim Day (host, performer), and the Oklahoma Wranglers (performer). Sponsored by John Doe Stores.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lazy Jim Day; Oklahoma Wranglers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Lazy Jim Day, Grant Turner) -- Theme -- Grant Turner introduces the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Monongahela Valley (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Grant Turner introduces Lazy Jim Day -- Singing News (Lazy Jim Day) -- John Doe Stores commercial (Grant Turner) -- John Doe Stores jingle (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Poor Boy (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Lazy Jim Day gives advice to letter writers -- John Doe Stores commercial (Grant Turner) -- John Doe Stores jingle (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- When I Leave This World Behind (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Closing statement (Lazy Jim Day) -- Theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Bureau of misinformation (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Day, Jim; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group); Willis Brothers; Willis, Guy, 1915-1981
